page.title: 20HIGHBRIDGE TOWN
page.content: Highbridge town is really a shadow of its former self.Once it was a big employer of the local men,but now lots of the local men are out of work.The original industries of the docks & railways have gone,especially with the closing of the locomotive works of the S.& D. railway in the 1950's.Most work now is in the newer industrial estates of Walrow.Many of the original buildings are now abandoned,or used for other purposes.Highbridge is rather a scruffy town with a very busy main road,the A 38 running through it.Many of the shops are unused or for sale.Very little new building has been done recently.There are two quite old council estates in Highbridge.
